text: All Chinese cities were under strict lockdown during the pandemic, but Wuhan’s closure was unique: apart from some foreign-passport holders, nobody in the city was allowed to leave. Citizens refer to this period as fengcheng—literally, “sealed city.” https://t.co/zSrJh0JPQX
